fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Heal Inspection (Night): Spend two pills to heal a player and give them Powerful defense.
-Interrogation (Night): Spend three pills to reveal a player's role.
-Poisoned Pills (Night): Spend three pills to poison your target or all their visitors.
-Silencing Pills (Day): Spend four pills to block someone from talking for the rest of the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: All herbs will convert into pills. Gain (n/2 rounded up) pills each night, where n is the night number.
